column4: maybe when you add device name? like /usr/bin/eject /dev/scd0 ? It seems a bit strange to me..
Will try that command in the script.
/usr/bin/eject /dev/dvdrw --- It worked.  I guess because my script is in ~/bin -- It's not same as /usr/bin -- Thanks. :>
